title: T206 Joe Kelly HOF PSA 3 For Sale

posts.post_title: T206 Joe Kelly HOF PSA 3 For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

I would like to sell this duplicate in my collection.

T206 Kelly PSA 3. Looks nicer, but small chip lower left border.

$100.00 Delivered. Paypal, check or money order. First email gets it.

Thanks,

Joe
